reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one noting its feminine back corset design, and appreciate its amazing quality, great fabric, and true-to-size fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress, great feel to it!
items.body: I love the material and the way the dress feels when I wear it, there is a lace up in the back which helped for further fitting which was great. Right out the bag the dress had some weight to it and was very slippery because of the material, very shiny smooth feel and ruching further added to the style of the dress. There is some stretch to it not a whole lot, and there are added length pieces on each side which is very pretty but can cause a little struggle for tripping but the slit accounts for it. The slit is pretty high in my opinion, I am 5‚Äù5 130-140 lbs, when fitting jeans I prefer a 28W/32L and the slit goes up to where my thigh bends near my hip as u would be wearing underwear right where it cuts into the hip is where it reaches for me at least. But if you hem it about half a hand size or a full hand size you should be alright, no biggie for a small fix nothing major. The flow of the dress is really smooth and lays out nicely behind you as you walk especially with the added length pieces. Read more
items.author: L√≠nea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very form fitting
items.body: Love, love, love this dress. It looked stunning and I got many compliments. 10/10 would buy from this seller again. It was actually the first time any seller had contacted me directly for a sizing chart‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è The only piece I had difficulty with was the slit. It was a little high and nearly showed my underwear. Overall very comfortable Read more
items.author: Elisabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: Great value dress. It was really long on me, Im 5' 0". But for being as formal, quality, and pretty as it is a great buy. I had to take it in a bit in the waist, so if you are really slim, you may need to alter it to get a good shape. Very flattering dress Read more
items.author: Edan

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap
items.body: Cheap , straps broke before It was ever worn Read more
items.author: lorraine reed

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Quality!!!
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous!!! The material is of solid quality and the dress drapes in all the most perfect ways! Seller asked for my measurements, and the dress arrived perfectly fitting out of the box. I am thoroughly pleased with my wedding dress!!! Read more
items.author: Scooter Wood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous fit, fabric, feel!
items.body: I ordered this dress for my daughter for prom, and it is FABULOUS! It is true to the product picture in all ways--cut, color, fabric, etc. She has about a 29-30.5 inch waistline, depending on how snugly we measure, and she's just shy of 5 feet tall. It fits her to perfection. The fabric itself doesn't really have any stretch or give to it, but the dress has a corset-like closure--it laces up in the back and there's enough of a fabric panel underneath that you have at least a couple of inches to work with. The dress has hidden boning to help give it shape. Though my daughter doesn't usually wear shapewear, she plans to with this dress because it is extremely form-fitting. The slit in the dress is quite high, but respectable. The area over that slit is actually a separate panel from the main train of the dress, but blends seamlessly. The dress is very long, so the bottom needs to be positioned for pictures, but you absolutely do not have to fear ordering this dress and getting a horror story of a dress that looks only remotely similar (which was my big fear in ordering, especially since you pay for shipping). We chose the standard shipping option and it took 18 days for the dress to arrive, as it was shipped from China. Although we weren't able to track it thru Amazon, we were able to track it online throughout the process. My daughter fell in love with the dress from the product pictures, and doesn't have a single regret with this purchase. I would absolutely trust ordering from this company again. Read more
items.author: J.W.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loved Dress
items.body: I am 5'10" ..42.33.45 measurement . I ordered size 16. Fits perfectly. Corsett was wonderful. Great material. Great color. Only complaint wrong color. I ordered Emerald Green and got Teal. Did not have enough time to exchange for correct color Read more
items.author: Taurus871

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTE POSITIVELY GORGEOUS
items.body: I got so many complements, so pretty, felt like a princess and here's what u need to know tho üòä 1. It's insanely long, like I wore near 5in heels and it was still dragging on the floor 2. The sizing is amazing, they custom tailored mine 3. A lot of fabric and not thin at all 4. DANCE PROOF 5. THE SLIT, the dress wants to expose u ü´£ Read more
items.author: Niyah

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Dark Gold, Orange, Plum, Lavender, Royal Blue, Mauve, Teal, Turquoise, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
